Custom exception for when ship placement attempts exceed a threshold

exception algorithm_helpers.ShipClashError(x: int, y: int, rotation: str, ship_length: int, ship_name: str = 'Ship', obstructing_ship_name: str = 'Ship')[source]

Bases: Exception

Custom exception for ship placement attempted in an occupied cell

exception algorithm_helpers.ShipExceedsBoardBoundsError(x: int, y: int, rotation: str, ship_length: int, ship_name: str = 'Ship', board_size: int | None = None)[source]

Bases: Exception

Custom exception for when ship would extend outside the board bounds

algorithm_helpers.fit_ship(board: list[list[str | None]], x: int, y: int, rotation: str, ship_length: int, ship_name: str) → bool[source]

Modifies board in-place updating the coordinates the ship would occupy

Changes the value stored in each coordinate in the board from None to the ship_name

Parameters:

  • board (Board) – Board to modify

  • x (int) – x-coordinate of target ship

  • y (int) – y-coordinate of target ship

  • rotation (str) – Rotation of target ship

  • ship_length (int) – Length of target ship

  • ship_name (str) – Name of target ship

Raises:

  • ShipExceedsBoardBoundsError – When ship would overflow board bounds

  • ValueError – When the rotation is neither ‘h’ nor ‘v’

  • ShipClashError – When any space the ship would occupy already has an existing ship placed there

Returns:

Success or fail

Return type:

bool
